title: Emmy Nominations 2021: A List of Nominees in Key Categories
sub_head: From ‘The Mandalorian’ to ‘The Crown,’ here are nominees for the 73rd Primetime Emmy Awards
body:
The nominations for the 73rd Primetime Emmy Award nominations were announced Tuesday. Disney+’s “The Mandalorian” tied Netflix ’s “The Crown” for the most nominations at 24. Here’s a list of nominees in major categories.
The Emmys will air on Sept. 19 on CBS. It will be hosted by Cedric the Entertainer.
“The Boys” ( Amazon Prime Video)
“Bridgerton” (Netflix)
“The Crown” (Netflix)
